title: Epidemic Simulation in a City
description: The main purpose of this simulation is to study and understand the spread of an epidemic in a city with a population of 1000 people.

interactions.name: person_to_person_interaction
interactions.description: This interaction involves person entities coming into contact with each other, potentially spreading the infection.

metrics.name: total_infections
metrics.description: This metric measures the total number of infections over time.

metrics.name: total_deaths
metrics.description: This metric measures the total number of deaths over time.

metrics.name: total_recoveries
metrics.description: This metric measures the total number of recoveries over time.

validation_criteria.name: realism
validation_criteria.description: The simulation should produce results that are consistent with what we know about the spread of epidemics in real-world scenarios.

validation_criteria.name: consistency
validation_criteria.description: The simulation should produce consistent results when run multiple times with the same parameters.
